Posts.Content: Hi all my mum has been diagnosed with breast cancer  So far she has had a mastectomy 3 tumours present. 12mm 12mm and 16mm She then had a sentinal node biopsy which showed full of cancer. She then had a further op to take out all the lymph nodes and now we are awaiting results  We have been told she is  Her 2 negative Oestrogen positive  Progestragen positive Still no treatment plan as we are still awaiting on lymph node results. Can anyone shed some light on this. We Wer told it’s good to be her2 negative? Is anyone in the same situation? Many thanks
Posts.Title: Cancer type?
